title: Sassy - powerful micro-saas template
home-section-hero-description: Empower your vision with tools to build Micro-SaaS solutions effortlessly.
home-section-how-description: Set up your subscription service in just three easy steps.
home-section-how-first-description: Create an account and set up your profile. Secure and fast with Supabase integration.
home-section-how-second-description: Connect Stripe for seamless billing and manage monthly or annual subscriptions.
home-section-how-third-description: Easily conetor and manage your subscriptions, with real-time updates.
